mapper.update: UPDATE t_users SET version_no=#{versionNo} WHERE user_id=#{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT t.user_id, t.nickname, t.phone, t.gender, t.head_url, t_user_cards.card_id, t_user_cards.card_no, t_user_cards.card_bank, t_user_cards.card_name, m_bank_types.bank_name, m_bank_types.bank_icon, t_user_account.balance, kf.qq as beUserQq, kf.phone as beUserPhone FROM t_users t LEFT JOIN t_user_cards ON t_user_cards.user_id = t.user_id AND t_user_cards.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN m_bank_types ON m_bank_types.bank_type = t_user_cards.bank_type AND m_bank_types.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN t_user_account ON t_user_account.user_id = t.user_id AND t_user_account.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN t_users kf ON kf.user_id = t.be_user_id WHERE t.user_id = #{userId} AND t.is_delete = 0

SELECT a.user_id as userId, a.bg_login_id as bgLoginId, a.login_name as loginName, a.password as passWord, a.nickname as nickName, a.phone, a.create_date as createDate, a.update_date as updateDate, a.qq, a.role_id as roleId, a.user_status as userStatus, c.balance, (select count(*) from t_user_cards uc where a.user_id=uc.user_id) as cardNumber,
b.agent_id as agentId, b.login_name as agentNumber, b.nickname as agentName,
e.user_id as beUserId, e.nickname as beUserName, e.login_name as beUserNumber,
d.role_name as roleName FROM t_users a left join t_user_account c on c.user_id=a.user_id left join t_users b on b.agent_id=a.agent_id and b.role_id=5 left join t_users e on e.user_id=a.be_user_id and e.role_id=3 LEFT JOIN m_roles d on a.role_id=d.role_id where a.is_delete = 0
and a.bg_login_id LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{bgLoginId},'%') )
and a.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{userId},'%') )
and a.login_name LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{loginName},'%') )
and a.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{nickName},'%') )
and a.user_type = #{userType}
and a.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{phone},'%') )
and a.qq LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{qq},'%') )
and a.role_id = #{roleId}
and b.login_name = #{agentNumber}
and e.login_name LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT( #{beUserNumber},'%') )
and a.be_user_id = #{loginbeUserId}
and a.agent_id = #{loginagentId}
and TO_DAYS(a.update_date) >= TO_DAYS( #{loginStartTime})
and TO_DAYS(a.update_date) <= TO_DAYS( #{loginEndTime})
and TO_DAYS(a.create_date) >= TO_DAYS( #{registerStartTime})
and TO_DAYS(a.create_date) <= TO_DAYS( #{registerEndTime})
order by a.create_date desc

SELECT a.head_url as headUrl, a.nickname as nickName, a.user_id as userId, a.bg_login_id as bgLoginId, a.phone, a.create_date as createDate, a.update_date as updateDate, b.account_id as accountId, b.balance, b.total_recharge as totalRecharge, b.total_expend as totalExpend, b.total_income as totalIncone, b.total_withdraw as totalWithdraw, b.total_lottery as totalLottery, cast((b.total_income-b.total_expend ) as decimal(10,2)) as actionTotle, c.card_id as cardId, c.card_bank as cardBank, c.card_no as cardNo, c.card_name as cardName, c.bank_type as bankType,
d.agent_id as agentId, d.login_name as agentNumber, d.nickname as agentName,
e.user_id as beUserId, e.nickname as beUserName, e.login_name as beUserNumber FROM t_users a LEFT JOIN t_user_account b ON a.user_id=b.user_id LEFT JOIN t_user_cards c ON a.user_id=c.user_id left join t_users d on d.agent_id=a.agent_id and d.role_id=5 left join t_users e on e.user_id=a.be_user_id and e.role_id=3 WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} limit 1

SELECT ifnull(b.bg_agent_id,'0') as bgAgentId, ifnull(c.login_name,'0') as agentNumber, ifnull(a.agent_id,'0') as agentId, ifnull(b.agent_name,'0') as agentName FROM t_users a JOIN m_agents b ON a.agent_id=b.agent_id LEFT JOIN t_users c ON b.agent_id=c.agent_id and c.role_id=5 WHERE a.bg_login_id = #{bgLoginId} limit 1
